CHAT.comment: INV places meerkat on the table.
mom takes the meerkat and looks at the bottom.
mom laughs.
child flips meerkat over onto its head.
mom takes meerkat and positions it so its head is on the corner of the table.
mom hands the meerkat to the child.
child hides meerkat under the table.
child keeps meerkat hidden under the table.
mom uncovers her eyes and looks around the room.
mom looks under the table and laughs.
child tries to put meerkat under the couch cushion.
mom covers her eyes.
child finishes putting meerkat under the couch cushion.
mom uncovers her eyes.
child points to the covered computer box.
child refers to what is under the cloth [= the computer box].
mom and child look back at the computer box.
mom lifts the couch cushion.
child pulls the meerkat out from under the couch cushion.
mom holds meerkat upside-down from its tail.
child gets out of his chair and walks away.
child squeals and runs back toward the table.
child stands in front of the mirror.
mom raises the meerkat up in the air.
mom and child laugh.
mom moves meerkat around in the air.
mom and child laugh.
child comes back to the table.
child takes meerkat.
child moves behind mom and raises meerkat in the air above her head.
child sits meerkat on top of mom's head.
mom sits meerkat on top of child's head.
child laughs.
child points around the room.
child tries to uncover computer box.
child bounces up and down on the couch.
mom motions for child to stop bouncing on the couch.
child gets up and goes toward the mirror.
child goes back to the table.
child closes his eyes.
mom hides meerkat under the table
child opens his eyes.
INV enters the room.
child and mom laugh.
child finds meerkat under the table.
INV takes meerkat out of the room
child closes his eyes.
INV uncovers computer box.
child moves toward computer box.
INV leaves the room.
mom moves closer to the computer box.
mother and child examine computer box.
child points to the top of the computer box.
mom puts finger over the sensor and the lights move.
child taps his finger over the sensor on the top of the computer box.
mom touches the top sensor.
child touches the middle sensor.
mom motions to lights on the side of computer box.
child tries to lift computer box up.
child sits on the floor.
child points to the table where the computer box is sitting.
mom directs her attention back to the computer box.
mom points to the lights down the side of the computer box.
child goes to touch top sensor and computer box lights up.
child puts his fingers over the top and middle sensors.
child points to the top sensor.
mom points to the top sensor.
mom points to the middle sensor.
child gets up and walks away from computer box.
mom continues to play with computer box.
child sits back in front of computer box.
mom moves her hand over the sensors and the computer box beeps.
child waves his hands around and nothing happens.
child tries again and it works.
INV walks over to the starfish tank.
INV covers up computer box.
INV uncovers starfish tank.
mom and child go over toward starfish tank.
mom points to something in the tank.
child walks away from starfish tank.
child comes back to the tank.
mom points to something in the tank other than the starfish.
child walks away from the tank.
mom directs her attention back to the starfish tank.
mom hands a snack to the child.
child gives mom his snack.
child gets up and walks away from the tank.
mom laughs.
INV covers starfish tank.
mom and INV laugh.
INV hands child the car.
INV utters something unintelligible.
mom laughs.
child examines the car and opens the hood.
mom and child push car back and forth.
child pushes car and it hits the chair.
mom pushes car.
mom and child make sound effects for the car.
child pushes car.
child gives car a big push across the room.
child crawls under the table to get the car.
child pushes the car across the room again.
mom pulls a chair toward her.
mom utters something unintelligible.
mom tips chair over upside-down.
child brings lunch bag over to the chair.
child puts lunch bag back.
child puts car on the floor.
child goes to get another chair.
mom puts chair upside-down next to other chair.
child brings third chair over and mom places it upside-down next to other two chairs, creating a tunnel.
mom and child look at each other through the chairs.
child pushes car through the tunnel.
mom and child try to push car back and forth through the tunnel.
mom moves car down the back of the chair.
mom laughs.
child pushes car through the chairs.
INV removes car from the room.
child tries to leave the room.
INV brings in degu.
mom gasps.
mom and child laugh.
mom and child speaks to degu.
child taps on the side of the cage.
child puts his fingers through the top of the cage.
child laughs.
child yells something unintelligible.
mom points to the top of the cage.
mom holds her hands up and makes claws with her fingers.
mom helps child take his shoes off.
child gets up and walks away.
INV removes degu from the room.
INV enters the room with the Robodog.
child plays with buttons on the Robodog.
child bends Robodog's head down.
child picks up Robodog.
child gets up and walks away.
child comes back.
child presses buttons on the Robodog.
child picks up Robodog and it starts moving again.
child gasps and gets up.
child puts chair in front of Robodog.
Robodog lifts his leg and makes a peeing sound.
Robodog starts to walk under the chair but gets stuck.
child pushes Robodog's head down.
Robodog walks under the chair.
